EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-07-25-Azure.ES-2018-07-24-Turbonomic-Azure-Invite-4.ES-2018-07-23-Turbo
EmailTemplate.subject: Will I see you tomorrow?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-azure/?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=azure-webinar&utm_term=megan]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
I wanted to make sure you didn't miss out, this is your last call to register for tomorrow's webinar at 11 am ET, as our team of cloud experts discuss the benefits of Turbonomic and Azure.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-azure/?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=azure-webinar]]>
During the webinar, you will learn how you can deliver accurate Azure migrations within days and see how to continously optimize compute, storage, and Azure SQL.
I hope to see you there!
Regards, Megan
PS. If you can't join us live, please feel free to register here anyways <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-azure/?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=azure-webinar]]>, and I'll send you the recording afterward.
